name: Adranea
description:
Adranea is a minimalist office sandbox, designed to emulate corporate life. You get to interact with various characters, each with their own unique art and dialogue.

*The game is in early alpha state.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Features
  • 5-10 minutes of playtime
  • Interaction with characters and completion of corporate tasks

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Credits
  • b0batea
  • hazelnut99
  • g0ldfish

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Created for  Newbies Game Jam 2022.
